original_title: Μπορούμε και κάτω απ' τα θρανία
overview: A scholar assigned to a high school that is famous for unruly pupils, and suffers from the pranks he get up to. But when a student falls in love and revealed the side of his character which he knows to feasts, he will win his students, combining fun and teaching.
title: Μπορούμε και κάτω απ' τα θρανία
